Package games

Class GameObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.GameObserver

  • public abstract class GameObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for observing a game matrix.

    • Field Summary

      • setDeterministic

        public void setDeterministic(boolean deterministic)
        Set the observer to operate in deterministic mode In this case, repeated queries for the same outcome are not counted as additional observations.

        Returns whether or not the observations are deterministic

        public int getNumActions(int player)
        Returns the number of actions of the given player or a vector of Integers with the numbers of actions.
        Parameters:
        player - the index of the player whose actions should be returned

      • getNumActions

        public int[] getNumActions()
        Returns an array containing the number of actions that each player has.

      • getNumProfiles

        public int getNumProfiles()
        Returns the number of profiles in the underlying game

      • getSample

        public double[] getSample(int[] outcome)
        Returns a sample of the payoffs for a particular outcome, recording the access. (in the deterministic case, max count is 1)

        If the bound on the number of samples has been reached, return null

      • getNumObs

        public int getNumObs()
        Returns the total number of observations

      • getObservationDensity

        public double getObservationDensity()
        Returns the sample density (total samples / num profiles)

      • getFractionProfilesObserved

        public double getFractionProfilesObserved()
        Returns the fraction of profiles that have at least 1 sample

      • getDescription

        public abstract java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns a description of the observation method

      • samplePayoffs

        protected abstract double[] samplePayoffs(int[] outcome)
        Returns payoffs for all players
        Parameters:
        outcome - the action choices for all players
